reviews.review: A perfect sequel to Portal. Feels like the old game with a bunch of new gameplay and story you won't expect. I love puzzle games and Portals physics challenges are one of the best I've played. Also the portal level builder is really fun to mess around with and you can try out other players levels. Highly recommend this game to anyone especially if you're bored during quarantine.

Definitely one of my favorite games of all time. I love the story and I honestly live for GLaDOS. What a queen. Anyway, this game is really immersive, intense, comedic, and relaxing all at once. Definitely play it sometime! <3
one of the games that I love so much I keep playing it over and over again for years.

lo he jugado 70 millones de veces (99% de veces de forma no legal xxd) y nunca me canso de decir que el compositor que creo todo el ost le da el toque perfecto para que este juego sea una obra de arte la re muy conchadetu madresita linda, literal aveces me quedaba afk escuchando los sonidos que emitian las maquinas en forma de musica xd sobre todo el cubo de compañia cuando te acercabas a ella y luego la hija de remi de GLaDOS te lo desintegraba xdxddxdx a ver si sacas el tercero gabe uwu xdxxxdxdxdxddxdxdxdddxddx bueno eso xao yiyiyolen
Fucking fenominal. 10/10, but it does lose its shine after a while.

It's very dynamic and makes you think outside the box. The CO-OP mode is very unique and fun to play with a friend. I highly recommend this game to anyone. The first game is good too and starts off the story great.
Love this game. It has a fantastic plot and gameplay

10/10
This game is very fun, it has a nice storyline, and it is challenging. 9/10
timeless campaign and coop experience, something I'll never stop revisiting.
If you liked the first game this is very much more of the same with some extra gimmicks bells and whistles.
very good game i think most people would also love this game
muy buen juego es mejor jugar de 2 players para reirse y pasar el rato
Great portals, great storyline, no cake (I think?), what more could you need?
Story mode is...... thats how good it is.

Good gameplay, the storyline is relatively short but I loved every minute of it. The game kept you busy learning new mechanics and showed that the game is more than just the tests. All of the achievements will keep you playing for hours after, if you want to get them all. Co-op mode is also a great way to show off your portal skills to others, as well as the custom maps if you are up for a challenge. I loved creating maps, but I would like the camera to be a bit more user friendly. A hold right click to change the camera angle would be much appreciated.

Portal is iconic.  Portal 2 might not be as gripping as the original, but it makes up for it with the Community Maps, an ever-expanding vista of puzzles.  If you can only have two games: make them Portal and Portal 2.
One of the best video games of all time!
A imersão em Portal 2 é muito específica. Jogo maravilhoso
possibly the funniest game i have every played i simply cannot fault it

WORTH. It's worth it alone for the voice acting of Stephen Merchant. This game is hilarious AND looks amazing despite the age of it. I have still yet to try the COOP but i have nobody to play it with :(

This is an amazing game. The puzzles are great, the lore is amazing, and this is an overall amazing game.

I absolutely love both Portal and Portal 2, play this with a friend it's so much fun- lots of communication needed to get through the game. I still hold out hope there will one day be a Portal 3.......
Very good and unique game for creative players looking for some fun ;)
Absolutely breathtaking game, loved every moment of this game. No spoilers but every character you meet is funny and charming in their own ways and the gorgeousness really sticks out.

Great puzzle  game, comedic, and fun  story line!  10/10!!!

Comprei esse jogo em 2014-2015 pois estava valendo apenas 5 reais, joguei o co-op com um amigo meu e nunca mais toquei no jogo. 

Tal ato se demonstrou ser um erro, fiquei incrédulo com um jogo tão bom desses que tava o tempo todo na minha biblioteca e nunca sequer tinha pensado em jogar. Alem de ter muitos mods otímos por ai.

I, uh can't really say anything bad about this game, cause really this game is amazing, the story, the gameplay, the first was good but the story felt dry, but the second, is great can't wait for the third, please valve, please.

Pros: Goofy plot and challenging gameplay.

Puzzles, what more do you want?

Juegazo, el modo historia me ha encantado... Puedes estar jugando todo lo que quieras con la nueva opcion de descargarte cámaras de pruebas. Sinceramente, es el mejor juego que he probado, 10/10. Vale la pena, vale cada céntimo. Todavia no he probado el modo coop, pero estoy seguro de que me gustará. Gracias por este juegazo, valve
Probably my top game of all time. I own it on 3 different systems. Because.

лютая и хардкорная жесть главный злодей каждые восемь уровней разрывает тебя на мелкие кусочки, вокруг кишки мясо и потроха роботов рекомендую всем

Being one of the first impressions of PC gaming, I was hooked as soon as I touched the game. This game, like many other Valve games, has never left my mind since, and I even come back to it occasionally. The workshop maps are endlessly fun, and the original campaign has many fun jokes, and does not hesitate to make fun of itself and its ideas. I love the visuals, the condescending voice of GlaDos, and the hints of crazy amounts of other lore (black mesa references are always great). Overall, I love the work that Valve did on this game, and I hope that it will translate into every other thing that they make.

Brilliant writing and voice acting make for two of the most interesting characters ever to be in video games. I found myself often standing in one spot listening to the dialogue because I didn't want to miss any of it.

The puzzles too are pretty genius. Incredibly well designed, providing a real challenge but at just the right difficulty level that with some experimenting most players would be able to solve it on their own.

Pretty much perfect for what it aspires to be.
ШЕДЕВР! Эх, была бы третья часть :(
